entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
